name: The Boosted Sapphire
description:
The theme of this Mix and Game Jam was: Dimension Change

In which I took a mechanic in one dimension and did it in another.

In this project, I put the mechanic of Minecraft's Creeper (3D) into a 2D game.

I tried making the browser version but my computer isn't that good.

This was submitted one day before the due date because I'm traveling.
